data.name: Jade Wilds
data.description: A quiet, serene landscape on the outskirts of Inazuma. A shrine made of Otogi Wood stands tall amongst the Sakura trees, the maple trees, and the colorful flowers. The candlelight flickers, blending in with an intangible sense of majesty and stability. Everywhere, the falling petals seem to be touched by spirituality.

text.text: This peaceful scene puts the mind at ease.
Even the most ordinary stretch of countryside, the humblest of hills, harbors poignant profundities from the distant past.
Offer them your full, undivided attention, and each flower, each tree, each blade of grass will whisper their stories to you.
Whoa, check it out, this looks just like Granny Oni's place...
Pretty sweet. The scenery's really makin' my day!
Let's go kick back in the shade. I'll tell you all my epic tales from roaming the wilds of Inazuma!
